channel.title: Problems with anims and gfx
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2gwuxd2.png[/img]
Obviously the client anims and server ones don't match up.
1. If anyone knows an anim list for 602 anims let me know cause I need it. The client I'm trying to make compatible with my server is full screen and uses really updated item ids and gfx.
2. Where Do I change the equip anim or gfx so it won't go crazy.
3. Would it be easier to just load the cache from the old PI client I use?

item.title: Problems with anims and gfx
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“TheHolyGrail, post:2, topic:395219”]You change the stand/walk/run etc emote for an item in CombatAssistant.java

Search for

and you’ll see a bunch of item standing emotes and such. Just edit the item you want or add it or whatever.

Hope I helped. :o[/quote]

That was partially what I needed. Now I just need an updated gfx/anim list. I’ve spent so much time googling one but can’t find for like 602+

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with anims and gfx
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

You change the stand/walk/run etc emote for an item in CombatAssistant.java

Search for

and you’ll see a bunch of item standing emotes and such. Just edit the item you want or add it or whatever.

Hope I helped. :o

Read full topic
